channel.title: 317 HELP needed
channel.description:
okay, im trying to run a 317 server! this isnt my first server, i have portforwarded it, made sure the firewall is off and NOTE* I CAN ACESS THE SERVER, I CAN GET ON AND PLAY, but when i try to post on moparscape it says the server is offline... what do i do to fix this, i have changed the EGUI, and the Client.java servers to my ip i need help
P.S. my firewall immensely slows down my computer, and i need it off to even run SOLITAIRE, so im leaving it turned off, but my virus protection is still on!
and if it helps at all im using the HALOSKAPE V1 source and client, my client is uploaded fine and running, but idk what to do to get the server "online"

item.title: 317 HELP needed
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

HAHAHAHAHA! This section of moparscape depresses me! The firewall is supposed to be off or have an exception for the server port.
You apperantly haven’t port forwarded right or you don’t know your IP address.
Use www.ipchicken.com for your IP.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 HELP needed
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

turn ur firewall on -.-

Read full topic
